name: airrvisualizationlibrary
description: Build Charts for AIIR Data Commons

scripts.build-dev: DEL /S /F /Q .\dist\* & RD /S /Q .\dist\lib & xcopy /Q .\node_modules\jquery\dist\jquery.min.js .\dist\lib\ & browserify -d -t [browserify-versionify] -t [ babelify ] -t [uglifyify] -p [ @jsdevtools/browserify-banner --file src/banner.txt ] ./src/index.js | exorcist ./dist/airrvisualization.js.map > ./dist/airrvisualization.js
scripts.build: del /S /F /Q .\dist\* & copy .\node_modules\jquery\dist\jquery.min.js .\dist\lib\ & xcopy /S /Q .\node_modules\highcharts\*.* .\dist\lib\ & browserify -t [browserify-versionify] -t [ babelify ] -t [uglifyify] -p [ @jsdevtools/browserify-banner --file src/banner.txt ] ./src/index.js -o ./dist/airrvisualization.js
